title.en: Shin Megami Tensei: Devil Summoner: Raidou Kuzunoha vs The Lone Marebito

altTitles.ja-ro: Devil Summoner - Kuzunoha Raidou Tai Kodokuno Marebito

altTitles.en: Shin Megami Tensei: Devil Summoner: Raidou Kuzunoha vs. The Lonely Spirit

altTitles.ja: デビルサマナー　葛葉ライドウ対コドクノマレビト

altTitles.ja-ro: Shin Megami Tensei: Devil Summoner - Kuzunoha Raidou Tai Kodokuno Marebito

description.en: Narumi Detective Agency is where the people of old Japan go to for mysterious and supernatural cases. But Narumi is just the face of the operation and the real hero is Kuzunoha Raido, the devil summoner. As a devil summoner, Raido can call upon many different demons to assist him in solving cases that deal with other demons causing harm in the human world. Lately, there have been a surge of cases and a powerful summoner seems to be behind all the incidents. Is the Narumi-Raido combo strong enough to overcome the demon force more powerful than anything they have experienced before?

altTitles.ja: ふだつきのキョーコちゃん

description.en:
Fudatsuki Kenji is known in his school for two things: for being a delinquent and a siscon. He constantly follows his little sister Kyoko around, fixing her giant ribbon, and chasing off any boys who might be interested in her.   
However, the truth is much stranger than what people believe: he doesn't actually have a crush on his sister. In fact, he likes Hibino, the only girl in his class who isn't afraid of him.
description.ru:
Фудацуки Кэндзи уже давно в школе считают хулиганом и сестролюбом. Причиной тому стало то, что он круглосуточно следит за своей сестрой Кёко, её гигантской лентой в волосах и отпугивает парней, которые заинтересованы в девушке. А ещё Кэндзи влюблен в Хибино-сан, единственную девушку, которая его не боится.   
Истина же в том, что его сестра буквально монстр. Она цзянши, то есть вампир — поэтому она гораздо сильнее человека и ей нужно пить кровь Кэндзи. Кёко носит ленту в волосах, которая сдерживает её аппетит и сильно влияет на личность своей хозяйки.  
Удастся ли Кэндзи сдержать в секрете силы своей сестры и получится ли что-нибудь с девушкой его мечты, Хибино-сан?
description.pt-br: Fudatsuki Kenji é conhecido na escola por duas coisas: por ser um delinquente e por ter um complexo de irmã. Ele sempre está grudado em sua irmã, Kyoko para cuidar dela e fazer de tudo que seu laço não se desfaça. O que acabou gerando uma fofoca em toda a escola que tem uma tara pela própria irmã.O que é uma grande mentira, ele não tem tara nenhuma pela irmã, mas tem um motivo para se protetor e principalmente com o laço dela, pois se o laço for desfeito algo de ruim pode acontecer. o que seria?

title.en: Shane x Onna Oujoushu no Manga

altTitles.ja: シェーン×女農場主の漫画

altTitles.ja-ro: Shane x Onna Oujoushu no Manga

altTitles.en: A Manga about Shane and the Farmer

description.en:
A Stardew Valley doujin that follows the love story of Shane and Mugi, a farmer who has just moved to Pelican Town. 
The story is semi-original and does not strictly follow the game's events and dialogue.

altTitles.ja: 異世界ウォーキング

description.en:
Ordinary student Sora has been summoned to another world as one of seven “chosen heroes” meant to battle the Demon King. While the other six are blessed with grandiose titles and superlative stats, Sora is stuck with no title, no level, and a single, underwhelming skill: he never gets tired from walking. After being judged useless to the cause, Sora is thrown out into the streets and left to fend for himself. Nevertheless, he grows determined to turn his unjust treatment and seemingly “useless” skill into a positive by earning money, making friends, and seeing sights he’s never seen before!

[Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/series/isekai-walking)
description.ja: 異世界に召喚された少年ソラは、勇者として魔王と戦うことを命じられる。しかし与えられた「ウォーキング」スキルの効果は、どんなに歩いても疲れないだけ! 国王から見放され、追放されたソラであったが、一度異世界へ足を踏み出すと突然レベルアップ!? 実は「ウォーキング」には「1歩進むごとに経験値１を獲得する」という隠し効果があったのだ!! その経験値で様々なスキルを獲得、歩くごとに万能となっていくソラは、のんびり気ままな異世界の旅へと歩み出す!!
description.pt-br:
Sora, um garoto japonês que foi convocado para outro mundo, ganhou a habilidade “Caminhar”. Seu efeito é que “não importa o quanto ande, ele nunca se cansa”. Por causa dessa habilidade fraca, o rei o expulsou do grupo de heróis convocados. Mas quando Sora começa a andar em outro mundo, ele subitamente sobe de nível!

Caminhar tinha um efeito oculto de “ganhar 1 EXP para cada passo dado”. Ele adquiriu habilidades úteis como 'Avaliação', 'Alquimia' e magia de cura...

Adquirindo uma habilidade após a outra, ele se tornou talentoso apenas andando! A aventura de encontrar e tocar o desconhecido está prestes a começar!

description.en:
Based on TFS's (Team Four Star's) Mr. Popo and Dragon Ball Z, Piccolo doesn't believe that Goku will be powerful enough to deal with Vegeta and Nappa in the Saiyan saga. So he goes to Kami's lookout to discuss options, that's when Kami comes up with the idea of having Piccolo fuse with Mr. Popo! Hilarity soon ensues.   
  
Artist's websites:  
<https://www.facebook.com/FabulousComics/>  
<https://fabulouscomics.deviantart.com>

Leah has been dreaming of a happy marriage. She has had two tries at her luck, but both times the engagements ended. When she got engaged for the third time she was determined that this time it was going to last. Even though she is determined, she keeps seeing a man called Julien with whom she got familiar prior to her engagement. Julien's proposal, combined with his kind personality and handsome face, made her swoon and she agreed to marry him.  

After their wedding, she was enjoying her honeymoon in Julien's estate, where she discovers traces of herself that she didn't know he had. She enters Julien's secret room that he had been hiding from her...

[Official Webtoon](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=59481128)
[Official Novel](https://ridibooks.com/account/login?return_url=%2Fbooks%2F809016837%3F_rdt_sid%3Dauthor%26_rdt_idx%3D4)

Note: The webtoon was released as R15, it's not R19 like the novel

Damals hatte Dokja noch überhaupt keine Ahnung. Er hatte keine Ahnung, dass sein Lieblings-Web-Roman ‘Drei Wege um die Apokalypse zu überleben’ Realität wird und dass er der einzige ist, der weiß wie der Weltuntergang aussehen wird. Er hatte auch keine Ahnung, dass er letztendlich der Protagonist von diesem Roman werden würde. Jetzt begibt sich Dokja auf eine Reise, um den Lauf der Geschichte zu ändern und die Menschheit zu retten!

description.en: Dokja was an average office worker whose sole interest was reading his favorite web novel 'Three Ways to Survive the Apocalypse.' But when the novel suddenly becomes reality, he is the only person who knows how the world will end. Armed with this realization, Dokja uses his understanding to change the course of the story, and the world, as he knows it.
description.es:
En ese entonces, Dokja no tenía idea de que su novela web favorita, Tres maneras de sobrevivir al apocalipsis, cobraría vida y que solo él sabría cómo iba a terminar el mundo. Tampoco tenía idea de que se convertiría en el protagonista de esta novela transformada en realidad. Ahora Dokja debe embarcarse en un viaje para alterar el curso de la historia y salvar a la humanidad de una vez por todas.

description.ja:
「ありえない...これは俺が知っている展開だ。」 10年以上読み続けた小説の最終話を読んだ日、世界は滅亡し小説の世界が現実となった。 平凡で冴えないサラリーマンの主人公・ドクシャ。 そんな彼の趣味はWEB小説『滅亡した世界で生き残る３つの方法』を読むこと。 ついに最終話を読み終えたかと思いきや、作者からのメッセージが届き小説のモンスターと登場人物が突如現れ、新たな世界が幕を開けた！ 「俺は、この世界の結末を知る唯一の読者となった。」 たった一人だけが読み終えたファンタジー小説が現実に。 果たしてドクシャは滅亡した世界を救うことができるのか？

description.vi: 'Mình biết diễn biến tiếp theo của câu chuyện này.' Ngay trong khoảnh khắc ấy, thế giới cũ bị diệt vong, và một thế giới khác được mở ra. Cuộc sống của một độc giả tầm thường bỗng chuyển sang chương mới, giữa thế giới của một cuốn tiểu thuyết nọ, một cuốn tiểu thuyết mà chỉ mình anh ta biết được kết cục.
description.zh-hk:
「您收到了主線任務。」 長著角的妖怪，熟悉的人物登場…… 太扯了...這是我所讀過的小說劇情！

description.en: After countless years, the Heavenly Demon, sealed within Mount Tai, finally awakened, only to discover that humanity had long abandoned the radiation-soaked Earth and was now exploring the far reaches of the galaxy.

altTitles.ja: ゴブリンスレイヤー

description.en:
A young priestess has formed her first adventuring party, but almost immediately they find themselves in distress. Luckily for her, the Goblin Slayer chose that place as his next killing grounds–a man who's dedicated his life to the extermination of all goblins, by any means necessary. And when rumors of his feats begin to circulate, there's no telling who might come calling next.  

**NOTE:**   
- There are *currently* no English scanlations of this manga. The chapters on the net are the official YenPress chapters.  
As long as they **(YenPress' chapters)** are in publication they are not allowed on MangaDex.  
  
**Links:**  
- [Official Twitter](https://twitter.com/GoblinSlayer_GA)  
- [Official LN (JP)](https://ga.sbcr.jp/sp/goblin_slayer/)  
- [Official Anime (JP)](http://www.goblinslayer.jp/)
description.pt: Uma sacerdotisa formou seu primeiro grupo de aventureiros, mas, quase imediatamente se encontram em apuros pelos goblins. E o Goblin Slayer é quem vem ao resgate – um homem que tem dedicado sua vida a exterminação de todos os goblins, através de qualquer meio necessário.
description.ru: Юная жрица вместе со своей командой впервые отправилась на поиски приключений, но они тут же попали в беду. На помощь им приходит Убийца Гоблинов – таинственный мечник, посвятивший свою жизнь уничтожению всех гоблинов любыми средствами. В итоге девушка присоединяется к нему в постоянном походе против всевозможных пород гоблинов, в котором сталкивается с новыми тайнами, врагами, друзьями, а иногда и конкурентками.
description.vi: Một nữ tu sĩ trẻ đã thành lập nhóm phiêu lưu đầu tiên của mình, nhưng gần như ngay lập tức họ thấy mình đang đau khổ. Đó là Goblin Slayer đến giải cứu — một người đã cống hiến cuộc sống của mình cho việc tiêu diệt tất cả những yêu tinh, bằng mọi cách cần thiết. Và khi những tin đồn về những kỳ công của anh ấy bắt đầu lan truyền, thì không ai nói được ai có thể gọi tới...
description.pt-br: Um homem deseja tornar-se um “aventureiro”, cujo lema é: “Eu não vou salvar o mundo, eu apenas vou matar goblins.” Após ouvir rumores sobre ele, uma elfa se aproxima dele com um pedido.

title.en: Magical Girl Tsubame: I Will (Not) Save The World!

altTitles.ja: 対世界用魔法少女つばめ

description.en: The world is in danger! Who will rise to protect it? Introducing Tsubame, an ordinary high school student who dreams of becoming a magical girl. But if she has to choose between the world and her friends... A new adventure from Mapollo 3, the creator of PPPPPP! Buckle up for some passion, magical girls, and a dash of madness!

altTitles.ja: 魔男のイチ

description.en: In this world, witches must hunt down their magic! Deep in the forest, the terrifying king of magic and the strongest witch are locked in deadly combat. But suddenly, a young boy joins the fray. His name is Ichi and he is just a hunter. But he has the power to flip the magic world upside down in this magic hunting fantasy epic!
description.ru: В этом мире ведьмы охотятся за своей магией! В глубине леса ужасающая маджика и сильнейшая ведьма схлестнулись в бою не на жизнь, а на смерть. Но вдруг к битве присоединяется молодой парнишка. Его зовут Ити, и он обычный охотник. Но у него есть сила перевернуть весь мир магии с ног на голову в этом эпохальном магическом фэнтези об охоте!
description.pt-br: Neste mundo, as bruxas devem caçar sua magia! Nas profundezas da floresta, o terrível rei da magia e a bruxa mais forte estão presos em um combate mortal. Mas, de repente, um jovem garoto se junta à briga. Seu nome é Ichi e ele é apenas um caçador. Mas ele tem o poder de virar o mundo mágico de cabeça para baixo neste épico de fantasia de caça mágica!

altTitles.ja: カナン様はあくまでチョロい

altTitles.vi: Ác quỷ Kanan dễ đối phó thật đấy

description.en: Kanan is a demon hiding in a high school in the human world to feed on the souls of humans. She sets her sights on a single high school boy, but somehow ends up in a lovers contract with him!? Kanan, who has never been in love, is now filled with new feelings!
description.ja: 人間の魂を喰らうべく、人間界の高校に潜伏する女悪魔・カナン。一人の男子高校生に狙いを定めるが、気づけばなぜか恋人契約を結ぶことに！？ しかし恋なんてしたことのないカナンには、未知な感情ばかりで…！ 甘酸っぱい青春とギャグの嵐！！
description.tr: Kanan, ruhları sömürmek adına liseye sızan dişi bir iblis. Erkek bir öğrenciyi avı olarak seçer ancak... her nasıl oluyorsa ardından kız arkadaşı olmayı kabul eder!? Daha önce aşkı hiç tatmamış olan Kanan, bilinmedik duygularla dolup taşıyor! Saf kalpli iblisimizin ilk aşkını anlatan sevimli romantik komedi başlıyor!
description.vi: Kanan là một con quỷ ẩn náu trong một trường trung học ở thế giới loài người để ăn linh hồn của con người. Cô ấy để ý đến một nam sinh trung học duy nhất, nhưng bằng cách nào đó lại kết thúc với một hợp đồng tình nhân với anh ta !? Kanan, người chưa từng yêu, giờ đang tràn ngập cảm xúc mới! Bộ truyện hài lãng mạn về mối tình đầu của một con quỷ có trái tim thuần khiết, bắt đầu!
description.es-la: Kanan es un demonio femenino que se esconde en un instituto del mundo humano para alimentarse de almas humanas. Se fija en uno de los chicos del instituto, pero de alguna manera acaba firmando un contrato de amante con él. Pero Kanan, que nunca se ha enamorado, está llena de emociones desconocidas... ¡Una tormenta de juventud agridulce y bromas! Comienza una bonita comedia romántica de primer amor sobre una Akuma de corazón puro...
description.pt-br: Kanan é uma demônio que se esconde em uma escola secundária no mundo humano para se alimentar de almas humanas. Ela põe em sua mira em um dos alunos da escola mas de alguma forma acaba assinando um contrato de amante com ele! Mas Kanan que nunca esteve apaixonada antes, está cheia de emoções desconhecidas…! Começa uma comédia romântica do primeiro amor de uma Demônio!

altTitles.ja: 第3のギデオン

description.en: The stage is the eve of the French Revolution. There is the commoner Gideon, who wants to save the impoverished country side-by-side with the members of the Estates General. Then there is the aristocrat, Georges, who will use any means to achieve his purpose. A man who wants to change the country, and a man who wants to destroy it. Both begin their journey forward. Will their joint efforts of love and hatred, justice and evil lead them to a hell of bloodshed, or an ideal future?

altTitles.ja: タプリスシュガーステップ

description.en:
A heartwarming everyday comedy about the trio of first-year students: Tapris, an earnest and pure angel who doesn't seem to be Gabriel's junior, Shinohara-san, a human who loves cute things, and Mei, a demon whose thinking is hard to understand.  
Whether it's the excitement of a first time experience, the excitement of a new friend, or playing with the Gabriel whom she looks up to, Tapris is busy every day!​  


---
description.ru:
Трогательная повседневная комедия о трех первогодках старшей школы: Таприс, искреннем и чистом ангеле, который, кажется, не младше Габриэль, Синохаре-сан, человеке, который любит милые вещи, и Мэй, демоне, чье мышление трудно понять.  
Будь то волнение от первого опыта, волнение от нового друга или игра с Габриэль, на которую она смотрит снизу вверх, Таприс занята каждый день!​

altTitles.ja: ヒト星人。

description.en:
Satou knows that his childhood friend Ninomiya is being bullied by his classmates, but he is unable to act. Then, Ninomiya expresses his feelings to him…
Friendship, sympathy, love. Pure and refracted emotions run through this true-to-life drama about boys.
___
[Alt Official Raw (Young Jump)](https://ynjn.jp/title/15101)

altTitles.en: There Is No Place for Fakes
No Place for the Fake Princess

altTitles.ja: ニセモノ皇女の居場所はない

description.en:
Philomel—the fake princess—conspires with her mother to impersonate the imperial princess and cause a war between the Mage Tower and the Empire.
Once her crimes were exposed, she was sentenced to execution.
A death truly befitting of a wicked—

“Even if the Philomel within the book had done some wrong, it wasn’t enough to warrant death!”

Philomel yelled and threw the book she'd been reading.
She had simply been curious about a book she'd picked up in the garden, but the contents of the book stated that she would die!
Although she wanted to believe it was nothing but fiction, everything that happened from that moment onwards went just like in the book.

“Since it has come to this… my goal is to survive!”

Will Philomel be able to discover the origins of the suspicious book and live on?

---
After finding a mysterious book in the imperial garden, Princess Philomel not only discovers that the book's villain shares her name, but that other events in the story are coming true too. Now, she believes that she's an imposter and that the real princess will take her rightful place, leading to the execution of Philomel the Fake! So to avoid a tragic death, she has to make sure the rest of the book doesn't come true. Can this fake princess change what's already been written?
description.fr:
Philomel — la fausse princesse — complote avec sa mère pour se faire passer pour la princesse impériale et provoquer une guerre entre la Tour des Mages et l'Empire. Une fois ses crimes exposés, elle est condamnée à l'exécution. Une mort vraiment digne d'une méchante...

‘Même si la Philomel du livre a fait quelque chose de mal, ce n'est pas assez pour justifier la mort!»

Philomel a crié et a jeté le livre qu'elle lisait. Elle avait simplement été curieuse à propos d'un livre qu'elle avait ramassé dans le jardin, mais le contenu du livre disait qu'elle allait mourir! Bien qu'elle ait voulu croire que ce n'était que de la fiction, tout ce qui s'est passé à partir de ce moment-là s'est déroulé comme dans le livre.

«Puisqu'on en est arrivé là... mon but est de survivre!»

Philomel parviendra-t-elle à découvrir les origines du livre suspect et à survivre?
description.id: Setelah bersekongkol dengan ibunya dan memicu perang antara kekaisaran dan menara sihir, Philomel si 'putri palsu' dihukum mati atas semua kejahatannya... Begitulah isi dari buku mencurigakan yang dipungut oleh Philomel di taman. Ia ingin memercayai bahwa cerita di dalam buku itu hanyalah fiksi, tapi semakin hari kejadian di dunia nyata semakin menyerupai buku itu. Agar tidak bernasib sama dengan Philomel yang ada di dalam buku, Philomel memutuskan untuk berusaha bertahan hidup. Akankah hidupnya berjalan sama seperti dengan buku mencurigakan itu?
description.pl:
Philomel - fałszywa księżniczka - spiskowała ze swoją matką, by podszyć się pod cesarską księżniczkę i wywołać wojnę między Wieżą Magów, a Imperium.
Gdy jej zbrodnie zostały ujawnione, została skazana na śmierć.
Konic godny nikczemnika...
"Nawet jeśli Philomel z książki zrobiła coś złego, to nie było to wystarczające, aby uzasadnić wyrok śmierci!"
Philomel krzyknęła i rzuciła książkę, którą czytała.
Była po prostu ciekawa książki, którą znalazła w ogrodzie, ale jej treść mówiła, że umrze!
Choć chciała wierzyć, że to nic innego jak bajka, wszystko, co wydarzyło się od tego momentu, przebiegało dokładnie tak, jak w książce.
"Skoro do tego doszło... moim celem jest przetrwanie!".
Czy Philomel uda się odkryć pochodzenie podejrzanej książki i żyć dalej?
description.pt-br: Philomel, a 'princesa falsa' que conspirou com sua mãe para se passar por princesa imperial, causou uma guerra ao separar a Torre Mágica do Império. Quando ela é considerada culpada de todos os seus crimes, ela é condenada à morte. Realmente digna de uma vilã... "Eu, não, Philomel no livro fiz algo errado, então não é o suficiente para me matar!" Philomel gritou e jogou o livro que estava lendo. Ela estava apenas curiosoa sobre o livro suspeito que pegou no jardim, mas ela, não, a princesa Philomel do livro morreu! Quero acreditar que é apenas uma ficção, mas de alguma forma tudo o que acontece depois se assemelha ao que está escrito no livro. "Agora que está assim... meu único objetivo é sobreviver!" Philomel será capaz de revelar o que aquele livro suspeito diz e reivindicar sua vida?

title.en: One Day a Message Window Appeared Out of Nowhere!?

altTitles.ja: ある日突然メッセージウィンドウが表示されたんですけど！？

altTitles.ja-ro: Aru Hi Totsuzen Message Window ga Hyoujisaretan desu kedo!?
Aru Hi Totsuzen Messeeji Windou ga Hyoujisaretandesukedo!?

description.en:
The protagonist, a university student named Kazuya Hayakawa woke up one day with a message window that shows up in his field of view. This window is always visible to him, and when certain lines are displayed in it, he gets thrown into confusion.

From that day onward began Hayakawa's daily ordeal of getting manipulated by this message window.

(Source: Amazon JP)
description.ja:
主人公・早川一哉はある日目が覚めるとメッセージウィンドウが見えるようになってしまった。
常に表示されるそのウィンドウにはとあるセリフが表示され主人公を混乱させる。

この日から早川一哉のメッセージウィンドウに振り回される苦難の日々が始まった。

altTitles.ja: 寄生列島

description.en: Sendo Chihiro, a high school girl, moves from Tokyo to the provincial island of Hanayama after her parents' divorce. There's something strange about the island she moves to. There is blatant discrimination against outsiders, mysterious rituals that suddenly take place, and a huge "water tower" built in the middle of the island... One day, a fisherman is stabbed to death in his home. The whole island becomes suspicious of the murderer, and the unexpected culprit is revealed――. A parasite psycho-thriller by Edogawa Edogawa of "Ikenie Touhyou".

altTitles.ja: 嘘喰い

description.en:
There are gamblers out there who even bet their lives as ante. But to secure the integrity of these life-threatening gambles, a violent and powerful organization by the name of “Kakerou” referees these games as a neutral party. Follow Baku Madarame a.k.a. Usogui (The Lie Eater) as he gambles against maniacal opponents at games – such as Escape the Abandoned Building, Old Maid, and Hangman – to ultimately “out-gamble” and control the neutral organization of Kakerou itself.  


---

**Links:**  
- [OAV on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=14163)
description.ru:
Есть игроки, которые ставят на кон свою жизнь. Чтобы сохранить целостность таких смертельно-опасных игр, жестокая и могущественная организация «Кагэро» судит их, как нейтральная сторона.
Наш герой — Баку Мадарамэ, «Пожиратель лжи». Игрок, чья цель — переиграть и в конце взять под контроль саму нейтральную организацию «Кагэро».

---

(Source: [readmanga](https://mintmanga.live/pojiratel_lji))
description.es-la: Hay jugadores que incluso apuestan su vida como apuesta. Pero para asegurar la integridad de estas apuestas que ponen en peligro la vida, una violenta y poderosa organización llamada "Kakerou" arbitra estos juegos como parte neutral. Sigue a Baku Madarame, también conocido como Usogui (El Devorador de Mentiras), mientras se enfrenta a oponentes maníacos en juegos como "Escapar del Edificio Abandonado", "La Vieja Doncella" y "El Ahorcado", para acabar jugando más que la propia organización neutral de Kakerou

altTitles.ja: さうのあっ!

description.en: The story centers on Kokage, a high school girl who doesn't really like bathing, at least not in traditional Japanese baths. She meets a Finnish exchange student, Lyydia, and reluctantly ends up going to the sauna with her. The group also is joined by Serika, a self-proclaimed sauna-otaku, and Maki, whose parents run a super-sento (bathhouse).

altTitles.ja: アオアシ

altTitles.th: AOASHI แข้งเด็กหัวใจนักสู้

description.de: Aoi Ashito ist ein Mittelschüler im dritten Jahr aus Ehime. Hinter seinem rohen Spiel verbirgt sich sein immenses Talent, aber Ashito erleidet wegen seiner allzu geradlinigen Persönlichkeit einen großen Rückschlag. Der Manager der Jugendmannschaft des J1-Clubs Tokyo City Esperion, Fukuda Tetsuya, erscheint vor Ashito. Fukuda sieht Ashitos grenzenloses Potenzial und lädt ihn ein, an den Probespielen seines Teams in Tokio teilzunehmen. Die Geschichte des Jungen, der den Fußball in Japan revolutionieren wird, beginnt sich schnell zu entfalten.
description.en:
Aoi Ashito is a third year middle school student from Ehime. Behind his raw game hides his immense talent 
but Ashito suffers a huge setback because of his overly straightforward personality. 
One day the youth team manager of J1 club Tokyo City Esperion, Fukuda Tetsuya, appears in front of him. 
Fukuda sees his limitless potential and invites him to take part in his team's tryouts in Tokyo. 
The story of the boy who will revolutionize football in Japan rapidly begins to unfold.  
  
---
- **Won the 65th Shogakukan Manga Award for General Manga in 2019**
description.ru: Ашито Аой, ученик третьего класса средней школы из префектуры Эхиме, встречает тренера «Молодежной лиги J» Фукуду Тацую. Несмотря на свою грубость, Ашито обладает таким удивительным потенциалом, что тренер Фукуда приглашает его принять участие в отборочных тестах своей команды в Токио. Взгляните на историю мальчика, который совершит революцию в японском футболе.
description.tr: Aoi Ashito Ehime'de ortaokul 3. sınıfa giden bir öğrencidir. Bir gün karşısına J1 Ligi kulübü Tokyo City Esperion'un altyapı takımı menajeri Fukuda Tetsuya çıkar. Fukuda Aoi'nin sonsuz potansiyelini farkeder ve onu Tokyo'daki altyapı seçmelerine davet eder. Böylece Japon futbolunda devrim yapacak çocuğun hikayesi başlar.
description.pt-br: Ashito Aoi, um estudante do terceiro ano do ensino médio de Ehime, conhece Fukuda Tatsuya, um treinador da "J Youth League". Mesmo que ainda tenha uma personalidade forte, Ashito tem um incrível potêncial que o fez ser convidado pelo treinador Fukuda para participar da seleção de sua equipe em Tóquio. A história do garoto que vai revolucionar o futebol no Japão vai começar.

description.en:
Chae Yu-ra is an ordinary girl who likes to watch online game broadcasts. She becomes the sole sponsor of an unknown streamer, Choi Ji-hyuk, who plays a virtual reality game called Constellation. But one day, she wakes up inside the game and discovers that she is Choi Ji-hyuk's constellation, which means she can grant him wishes and powers.

Choi Ji-hyuk, on the other hand, is an elite hunter who is determined to take revenge on the constellation that abandoned him in the past. He is unaware that his constellation is actually Chae Yu-ra, the girl he despises for her lack of skill at the game. How will they relate to each other in this dangerous world full of mysteries?
description.es-la:
El único error que he cometido hasta ahora es ver una transmisión sin espectadores de un juego online.
Mi único crimen fue patrocinar a alguien duramente.
ㅤ
Pero ahora lo entiendo.
¡Hacerme pasar por esta terrible experiencia es demasiado duro!
ㅤ
"¡No podemos perder más tiempo"
"¡Espera un minuto, déjame comprar esta armadura"
ㅤ
"¿Qué es esto?"
Me pregunté mientras veía esa transmisión antes de que eso pasara.

___________________________________________________
ㅤ
Choi Ji-hyuk miró fijamente el artículo que venía como recompensa de una Mazmorra de Clase S.
Era un objeto obtenido que había arrebatado a los otros Cazadores que intentaban obtenerllo.
ㅤ
"No importa cuanto impida este objeto la destrucción del mundo"
"No importa si es un objeto por el que arriesgué mi vida"
"Incluso si muero, seré miserable, por eso, si es he de morir, al menos quiero ver la cara de esa maldita Constelación"
ㅤ
Pero, ¿quién hubiera pensado que esa Constelación era una chica que parecía tener poco más de 20 años?
ㅤ
"Chae Yu-ra"
ㅤ
Él lo lamentó por ella, quien había vivido una vida normal y pacífica toda su vida, desafortunadamente, nunca tuvo la intención de abandonar a su Constelación.
ㅤ
"Dime que soy lo más importante para ti"
ㅤ
Al menos así será hasta que llegue el fin del mundo
ㅤ
"Dímelo"

altTitles.fr: La Grande Jahy ne Perd Jamais

altTitles.en: The Great Jahy Will Not Be Defeated!

altTitles.ja: ジャヒー様はくじけない！

description.en:
Jahy-sama (pronounced jah-hee) is an existence to be feared and respected throughout the Demon Realm. Well, was.

The (former) Demon Realm No. 2 is now busy with house chores and work…in the human realm! Her dinner is just beansprouts, and she can't afford anything except water at cafes, but she won't get discouraged!

---
**Note:**
Jahy's shirt says '魔界復興', which seems to translate to 'Demon Realm Restoration'.
description.ru: Джахи-сама - существо, которое боялись и уважали во всем демоническом мире. Ну, когда-то... Вторая по силе (прежде) мира демонов теперь занята домашними заботами и работой... в человеческом мире! Её ужин - одна фасоль, а в кафе она не может себе позволить ничего кроме воды, но её никогда не сломить!

altTitles.ja: ダンガンロンパ1・2 コミックアンソロジー

description.en:
Based on the games of the same name, a variety of authors and artists write a large offering of short stories starring the various characters featured in the games. The stories range from being lovingly heartfelt, packed full of comedy and gags or being downright evil or messed up sometimes!  
  
Note: These are NOT doujin. These are official comic anthologies licensed by Spike Chunsoft, the developers of the Danganronpa series.
description.pt-br:
Baseado nos jogos de mesmo nome, uma variedade de autores e artistas escrevem uma grande oferta de contos estrelando os vários personagens apresentados nos jogos. As histórias variam de ser amorosamente sinceras, cheias de comédia e piadas ou ser francamente maligno ou confuso às vezes!

Nota: Estes NÃO são doujin. Estas são antologias oficiais de quadrinhos licenciadas pela Spike Chunsoft, os desenvolvedores da série Danganronpa.

altTitles.ja: バトルスタディーズ

description.en:
You can’t win through only with “friendship” and “youth”. We stake our lives to get to Koshien!!  
  
Kanou Shoutarou entered an official baseball club at one of the best powerhouse baseball schools in the country - DL Gakuen. However the discipline in the club, he admired so much, was beyond all imagination!  
  
From Nakibokuro - the former member of PL Gakuen’s baseball club who played at the Koshien as the regular!

altTitles.ja: ラディア〜神殺しの私が神の恋人!?〜

description.es-la:
La búsqueda de venganza de Radia contra su traicionera amiga da un giro inesperado cuando Julius, un hombre misteriosamente poderoso, la salva de una experiencia cercana a la muerte.
¿El giro? Julius es un fantasma, visible solo para Radia.
ㅤ
Cuando se convierte en su compañero constante, Radia se ve envuelta en una red de contratiempos sobrenaturales que revelan cuán poderoso es realmente Julius.
Y aunque ni siquiera Julius conoce su verdadera identidad todavía, su casi omnipotencia podría ser la clave para que Radia se vengue.
Sin embargo, este poder también podría ocultar un peligro acechante que amenaza con reconfigurar su búsqueda de formas inesperadas y peligrosas...

description.en: Heesu's world revolves around Chanyoung, his best friend and secret crush. He doesn't mind cheering Chanyoung from the sidelines or listening to all his girl problems. He doesn't care if people only know him as "Chanyoung's friend." Then one day, Heesu starts hearing his name everywhere. On the bus, in the halls, during lunch… Turns out, there's a rumor going around school (Got a love problem? Find Heesu in Class 2 and he'll tell you what to do!) and with that, Heesu suddenly finds himself the center of attention. But how could he give anyone advice? He doesn't even know what to do about his own crush!
description.fr: Le monde de Heesu tourne autour de Chanyoung, son meilleur ami dont il est secrètement amoureux. Cela ne le dérange pas d’encourager Chanyoung en étant qu’un spectateur ou bien d’écouter tous ses problèmes de fille. Il s’en fiche que les gens le considèrent comme seulement son « ami ». Cependant un jour Heesu commence à entendre son nom de partout : dans le bus, dans le hall et même pendant la pause de midi ? Une rumeur circule dans l’école : Vous avez un problème ? Trouvez Heesu dans la Classe 2 et il vous dira que faire ! Heesu se retrouve soudainement au centre de l’attention. Mais comment il peut conseiller quelqu’un alors qu’il sait pas quoi faire pour son propre amour.

altTitles.ja: 夜桜さんちの大作戦

altTitles.es-la: La Misión de la Familia Yozakura

altTitles.vi: Nhiệm vụ tối thượng nhà Yozakura

description.en:
Taiyo Asano is a super shy high school student and the only person he can talk to is his childhood friend, Mutsumi Yozakura. It turns out that Mutsumi is the daughter of the ultimate spy family! Even worse, Mutsumi is being harassed by her overprotective, nightmare of a brother, Kyoichiro. What drastic steps will Taiyo have to take to save Mutsumi?!

---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media as **Mission: Yozakura Family** (2023)
- [English volumes (Viz Media)](https://www.viz.com/mission-yozakura-family)
description.es:
Taiyo Asano es un estudiante de secundaria súper tímido y la única persona con la que puede hablar es su amiga de la infancia, Mutsumi Yozakura. ¡Resulta que Mutsumi es la hija de una última familia de espías! Peor aún, Mutsumi está siendo acosada por su sobreprotector hermano, Kyoichiro. ¿Qué decisión tendrá que tomar Taiyo para salvar a Mutsumi? Una comedia familiar de espías: ¡Comienza la misión!

---
Publicado en Español por [Norma Editorial](https://www.normaeditorial.com/catalogo/manga/serie/mision-familia-yozakura) como "Misión: Familia Yozakura" (2022)
description.fr:
Afin de protéger Mutsumi et de découvrir la véritable raison de la mort de ses parents, Taiyo Asano va devoir devenir membre de la famille Yozakura, une famille d’espions de haut vol ! Parviendra-t-il à survivre à ce quotidien plein de dangers pour, cette fois, réussir à protéger ceux qui lui sont chers ?

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Kana**
description.it: Taiyo Asano è un timidissimo studente delle superiori e l'unica persona a cui può parlare è la sua amica d'infanzia, Mutsumi Yozakura. Si scopre che Mutsumi è la figlia della suprema famiglia di spie! Ancora peggio, Mustumi viene tormentata dal suo fratello iperprotettivo, Kyoichiro. Quale tragico destino Taiyo dovrà affrontare per salvare Mustumi?! Una commedia su una famiglia di spie - la missione avrà inizio!||
description.ja: 超人見知りの高校生･朝野太陽が話せるのは、幼なじみの夜桜六美ただ一人。けれど六美は代々続くスパイ一家の娘で、極度のシスコンの兄が太陽排除に動き出した！　自らと六美を守るため太陽がとった手段とは!?
description.es-la: Taiyo Asano es un estudiante de secundaria súper tímido y la única persona con la que puede hablar es su amiga de la infancia, Mutsumi Yozakura. ¡Resulta que Mutsumi es la hija de una última familia de espías! Peor aún, Mutsumi está siendo acosada por su sobreprotector hermano, Kyoichiro. ¿Qué decisión tendrá que tomar Taiyo para salvar a Mutsumi? Una comedia familiar de espías: ¡Comienza la misión!
description.pt-br: Taiyo Asano é um estudante super tímido do ensino médio e a única pessoa com quem ele consegue conversar é sua amiga de infância, Mutsumi Yozakura. Acontece que Mutsumi é a filha da melhor família de espiões! Pior ainda, Mutsumi está sendo assediada por seu super-protetor, o pesadelo de um irmão, Kyoichiro. Que passos drásticos Taiyo terá que tomar para salvar Mutsumi? Uma comédia familiar de espiões – a missão começa!

description.en:
Some parents give their kids an inheritance. Some give their kids a car. Jinwon's parents gave him… a motel. And not even a great one. Rundown and in need of massive repairs, the Ballantine Motel used to be a golden goose. But, of course, a drunk driver running his car through the entrance tends to change things.  
  
So when Jinwon takes over, he makes some upgrades and additions. And while "Ballantine" is a nice name, it's a bit long. So, of course, he makes the obvious choice and shortens it. The BL Motel is the neighborhood's newest addition. Of course, now all Jinwon needs is some new help and maybe find out why so many gay couples have started visiting. Then again, when life give you lemons, you lean in and stock the vending machines with lube.
description.fr: Certains parents donnent un héritage à leurs enfants. Certains donnent à leurs enfants une voiture. Les parents de Jinwon lui ont donné… un motel. Et même pas un grand. Un délabré et nécessitant d’importantes réparations, le motel Ballantine avait l’habitude d’être une poule aux oeufs d’or. Mais, bien sûr, un chauffeur ivre qui le traverse avec sa voiture a tendance à changer les choses. Alors, quand Jinwon prend la relève, il fait des améliorations et des ajouts. Et bien que « Ballantine » soit un joli nom, il est un peu long. Alors, bien sûr, il fait le choix évident et le raccourcit. Le BL Motel est la dernière nouveauté du quartier. Bien sûr, maintenant, tout ce dont Jinwon a besoin, c’est d’un nouvel employé et peut-être de découvrir pourquoi tant de couples gays ont commencé à le visiter.

description.en:
The downfall of a noble family. And a girl who risks her life seeking revenge.

“Lady Ayana.”

There was a knight who had been by her side for thirteen years. The person who came to her mind before her own family was going to be annihilated. He risked his life for her, suffered wounds, hunger, and gave her everything. Now, he is looking at her while she’s waiting for her execution with a joyful smile.

“Please show me another enjoyable story this time, my lady.”

The devil smiled and extended his hand, and the girl took it.

“I hope you get the ending you desire in the next story, my lady.”

(Source: Kakao, translated)
description.es: Ella tuvo que pasar por la aniquilación de su familia, él llegó al final de su vida para darle la oportunidad de vengarse. “Aiana.” El caballero que estuvo a mi lado durante 13 años, arriesgó su vida, sufrió, pasó hambre y lo dio todo por mí. Pero ahora, al presentarse mi muerte inminente, sonreía felizmente mientras contemplaba mi desceso. “Por favor, ten una historia agradable esta vez, mi señora”. El demonio sonrió y me tendió la mano. “Espero que en la próxima historia obtengas el final que deseas”

altTitles.ja: 宝石の国

description.az: Cəvahiratlar ölkəsi (Houseki no Kuni), meteoritlərin altı dəfə Yerə düşdüyü və bu prosesdə onu məhv etdiyi uzaq gələcəkdə baş verir. Demək olar ki, bütün canlılar məhv oldu, qalan bütün torpaqlar tək bir sahilə çevrildi. Çox uzun zaman dilimləri ərzində həsas həyat forması olan yeni bir irq yarandı; insan şəklini alan ölməz zinət əşyaları. Fosfofillit (Phos) zəifdir (ən aşağı sərtliklərdən birinə malikdir) və həmyaşıdları tərəfindən yararsız hesab edilir. Phos'a təbiət tarixinin ensiklopediyasını yaratmaq tapşırığı verildikdən sonra o, uzaq, lakin müdrik həmkarı Kinovarın (Cinnabar) köməyinə müraciət edir, beləliklə onların dostluğu və şəxsi inkişafı başlayır. Eyni zamanda “Cəvahirat camaatı” onun dəbdəbəli dəyərindən yararlanmaq istəyən Aydan gələnlərlə (aylılarla) müharibə aparır.
description.en: In the distant future, a new life form called Houseki (gems) are born. The 28 Houseki must fight against the moon dwellers who want to attack them and turn them into decorations, thus each gem is assigned a role such as a fighter or a medic. Though they hope to fight the moon dwellers, Phos is a gem who is given no assignment until the gems' master Adamantine asks them to write an encyclopedia.

altTitles.ja: 空手小公子こひなたみのる
空手小公子小日向海流

description.en: Kohinata Minoru is a college student at a college that is popular for its sports rather than academic orientation. He starts out as a gymnast alongside his friend, Nana, but is bullied by his gymnast seniors. One evening, a karate student at the college, Mutou Ryuuji, witnesses Minoru being bullied and comes to his rescue and drags him into the world of karate. Minoru makes new friends and learns some of their dark pasts, including a shocking death that reveals motives for revenge. (from Baka-Updates)

The war between humans and vampires will come to an end with the victory of the vampires, as expected by all. In the yet-to-be-invaded Holy Land of Bahal, after a concerted effort to counterattack mankind, he succeeds in creating a "corpse knight" who never dies and a "power source" that can move him, thus reviving the gladiatorial "Gunther" as a "corpse knight."
description.ko: 인간과 뱀파이어와의 전쟁은 모두의 예상대로 뱀파이어의 승리로 끝을 맞이하게 된다. 아직 침략받지 않은 성지 ‘바할’에서 인류의 반격을 위한 각고의 노력 끝에 죽지 않는 ‘시체 기사’와 그를 움직일 수 있는 ‘동력원’ 제작에 성공하여, 검투사였던 ‘군터’를 ‘시체기사’로 되살리게 된다.

description.en:
Yu Hyeol, a third-rate warrior infamously nicknamed *“The Star of the Dark Arts”* due to his menacing appearance, lived a life plagued by false rumors and endless misunderstandings. One day, Seolhwa—the woman he once vowed his future to—reappears before him, no longer the gentle figure he remembered but a formidable master of martial arts.  

From that moment, his name becomes entangled with the lives of countless warriors, spiraling his already infamous reputation. As his so-called “notoriety” spreads, the Murim Alliance, the Demon Cult, and even the royal court take notice of him.  

*"No, really… it’s all just a big misunderstanding!"*  

But can he convince the world otherwise? Or will he unintentionally become the legend he never aimed to be?

altTitles.ja: のあ先輩はともだち。

altTitles.en: Noa is My Senior, and My Friend.

description.en:
A bitter and painful adult's life needs "friends".  Set in a game company, Rihito Otsuka (23), who is your everyday salaryman, and Noa Saotome (27), the ultimate career woman. Two characters whose lives aren't supposed to intersect become "friends" by chance.  A little sweet and slightly heavy office "friends" comedy begins!

---

**Links:** 
- [Alternative Raw (Ch15 Continue Here)](https://ynjn.jp/allEpisodeList/10427)
description.ja:
苦くて辛いオトナの人生にこそ、“ともだち”が必要だ。ゲーム会社を舞台に、仕事も人付き合いも“ほどほど”が身上の「平熱さとり系」大塚理人(23)と、何事にも全力すぎる「限界バリキャリ」早乙女望愛(27)。交わらないキャラのふたりが、ひょんなことから「友達」に…？　少し甘くて若干重めな「オフィス”ともだち”コメディ」スタート！

---

**Links:** 
- [Alternative Raw (Ch15 Continue Here)](https://ynjn.jp/allEpisodeList/10427)
description.ru:
«Друзья» необходимы в горькой и мучительной жизни взрослого человека.

История, происходящая в игровой компании, разворачивается вокруг Рихито Оцуки (23 года), который «умерен» в своей работе и социальных взаимодействиях, и Ноа Саотомэ (27 лет), карьеристки, которая выкладывается на полную во всём, что делает. И эти два непересекающихся характера случайно становятся «друзьями»?.. И так начинается немного сладкая и тяжеловатая «офисно-дружеская» комедия!

---

**Links:** 
- [Alternative Raw (Ch15 Continue Here)](https://ynjn.jp/allEpisodeList/10427)
description.es-la:
La vida amarga y dolorosa de los adultos necesita amistades. Ambientado en una compañía de videojuegos, Rihito Otsuka, un oficinista de 23 años. Que es normal socializando y trabajando. Y Noa Saotome de 27, que lo da todo en todo lo que hace. Dos personaje que a priori no encajan... ¿Pueden ser amigos por casualidad? 
¡Comienza una dulce y pequeña pero pesada comedia sobre amigos de oficina!

altTitles.ja: 凍結したプレイヤーの帰還

altTitles.fr: Le retour du joueur qui était congelé
Le retour du joueur de gel

description.en:
When Seo Junho and his companions sacrificed themselves to defeat the Frost Queen, they thought they were restoring peace to Earth. But after 25 years of being frozen solid, Junho thaws out only to find that nine more floors appeared in his absence, only one of which has been cleared!

As the only one who holds the key to clearing the next floor and defrosting his friends, Junho must step up once again. But has this hero been in hibernation too long to take on the world’s fearsome new foes?

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%96%BC%EC%96%B4%EB%B6%99%EC%9D%80-%ED%94%8C%EB%A0%88%EC%9D%B4%EC%96%B4%EC%9D%98-%EA%B7%80%ED%99%98/2463)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.podoteng.com/)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/79447)
description.ja:
2019年世界は変わり、以前にはなかったゲート、モンスター、システム、プレイヤーのような概念が生まれた。 そこから5年間「侵略者」と「侵略を阻止する者」との戦いが世界各地で起きた。 そして世界を絶望に陥れた地球エリア最後のボス「氷の女王」により、5人のプレイヤーの内4人は氷の像となってしまう。 唯一ダンジョンに残された人類最高のプレーヤー、ダークネスは、氷の女王を倒すが、女王の能力を吸収する過程で彼もまた氷の像となった。氷の女王を倒すと、 長い眠りにつくという代価を払わなければならなかったのだー それから25年後…プレーヤーは目を覚ました。 「2階が出現し、計10階だと？1階の氷の女王を倒したら終わりじゃなかったのか？｣ この25年で人類が攻略できたのはたったの2階まで…。 伝説のプレイヤー「ダークネス」の名を捨て、新人プレーヤー伊坂圭として、仲間たちを救うため、彼は再びゲートに向かう！

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%96%BC%EC%96%B4%EB%B6%99%EC%9D%80-%ED%94%8C%EB%A0%88%EC%9D%B4%EC%96%B4%EC%9D%98-%EA%B7%80%ED%99%98/2463)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.podoteng.com/)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/79447)
description.ko:
세상이 바뀌고 5년.
최종보스가 나타났다.

[지구 에어리어의 최후의 보스, 서리여왕이 출현합니다.]

최후의 보스!
그녀만 처치하면 예전처럼 살 수 있다!

인류 최고의 플레이어, 어둑서니를 포함한 다섯 명의 플레이어가 마침내 서리여왕을 쓰러뜨리지만...
그들은 기나긴 잠에 빠지는 혹독한 대가를 치뤄야했다.
그로부터 25년 후.

"2층이라니? 서리여왕을 죽이면 끝나는 거 아니었어?"

얼어붙은 동료들을 구하기 위해,

그리고 세상을 구하기 위해.

전설이 된 어둑서니의 이름을 버리고
이제는 신입 플레이어 서준호로 돌아왔다.

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%96%BC%EC%96%B4%EB%B6%99%EC%9D%80-%ED%94%8C%EB%A0%88%EC%9D%B4%EC%96%B4%EC%9D%98-%EA%B7%80%ED%99%98/2463)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.podoteng.com/)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/79447)
description.ru:
В 2019 году мир переменился, и появились такие явления как: врата, монстры, система и игроки, - которых ранее не существовало. 
На протяжении 5 лет между человечеством и захватчиками происходила борьба за власть и территории.
[Финальный босс "Снежная королева" появился]
Если убить его, человечество сможет обрести свободу и вернуться к прежней жизни. 
24 ноября 2024 года четверо из 5 игроков вошли в последнее подземелье на Антарктиде, чтобы победить финального босса на территории Земли. Одним взмахом руки "Снежная королева" заморозила Тихий океан, повергнув человечество в отчаяние. 
Последнему игроку удалось победить финального босса, однако в процессе поглощения ее "ядра" он превратился в ледяную глыбу. А спустя 25 лет, когда поглощение завершилось, он очнулся от криогенного сна, получив фрост-способность EX-класса.

description.zh-hk:
世界發生了天翻地覆的變化，
在第5年時最終BOSS現身。
「地球區域最終BOSS，冰霜女王出現。」

最終BOSS!
只要除掉祂，就能回到過往的生活!

包含人類最強獵人——闇夜在內的五名獵人，
最終擊潰了冰霜女王...
但他們卻陷入長眠，付出了慘痛的代價。

之後過了25年...
「第2層?不是只要殺了冰霜女王，
一切就結束了嗎?」

為了拯救被冰封的夥伴；
為了拯救整個世界，
我拋下成為傳說的闇夜之名，
以本名徐俊昊，作為新人獵人歸來。

altTitles.th: ALTAIR ดาวจรัสฟ้า อินทรีถลาลม

altTitles.ja: 将国のアルタイル

altTitles.vi: Sao Thiên Ưng trên bầu trời Tướng quốc

description.en:
For generations the Torqye Pashalu and the Balt-Rhein Empire have stood in stern opposition of each other. Then one night, when an Imperial minister is found assassinated, the two nations are plunged into a potentially explosive situation. As the generals of Torqye's council cry for war, Mahmut comes to discover the devious truth behind the assassination. Thus the young pasha's battle for his country and peace and trust in his fellow man begins…  

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10291/episode/324757) (U.S. Only), [Kodansha](https://kodansha.us/series/altair-a-record-of-battles/)

**Notes:**
- Won the 41st Kodansha Manga Awards in the shounen category.

title.en: Mobile Suit Gundam Pulitzer - Amuro Ray Beyond the Aurora

altTitles.ja: 機動戦士ガンダム ピューリッツァー -アムロ・レイは極光の彼方へ

altTitles.ja-ro: Kidou Senshi Gundam Pulitzer: Amuro Ray wa Kyokkou no Kanata e

description.en: In UC0095, following the events of Char's Counterattack, Kikka Kobayashi gathers testimonies about Amuro Ray to show the world the kind of person he was.

altTitles.en: Till We Meet Again, My King

altTitles.ja: さよならまたね、僕の王1

description.en:
Zhang Li sees his beloved "stone statue" vanish before his eyes. Stricken with grief and remorse, he travels back in time and arrives in Elbis, a mythical ancient civilization that mysteriously perished.  At last, he encounters the "stone statue" again, only to find that he wasn't the old crybaby that clung to him every day, but a cold, ruthless "tyrant" instead. Will he be able to stay with him this time…?

Official Translations:
[Korean](https://www.bomtoon.com/comic/ep_list/my_majesty)
description.uk: Просто на очах Джана Лі мила його серцю кам'яна статуя щезає у небутті. Сповнений горя та каяття, юнак мандрує в минуле та потрапляє до Айбіссу, стародавньої цивілізації, що, за легендами, загадково вгасла багато сторіч тому. Удруге стрівши кам'яну статую, він усвідомлює, що дурник-плаксій, який бігав за ним хвостиком, перетворився на байдужого й безжального “деспота”. Чи здатен він залишитись із ним цього разу?..

altTitles.ja: 戦姫完食シンフォギア～調めし～

altTitles.en: Feast of the Valkyries: Cooking with Shirabe

description.en: An official spinoff of the Senki Zesshou Symphogear series! The divas' next battlefield is a warm gourmet comedy with the chief kitchen maid, Shirabe! Another Symphogear ballad, fresh from the kitchen.
description.ja: 人間を炭素化させ死に至らしめる認定特異災害“ノイズ”やそれぞれの思惑を胸に世界と敵対する“錬金術師”たち、そして“神々の種族”との世界の命運を賭けた闘いを経て、歌女たちが辿り着いた次なる戦場は――！？

title.en: Otonari no Tenshi-sama ni Itsu no Ma ni ka Dame Ningen ni Sareteita Ken

altTitles.ja: お隣の天使様にいつの間にか駄目人間にされていた件

altTitles.en: The Angel Next Door Spoils Me Rotten

altTitles.pt-br: Meu Anjo de Vizinha Me Mima Demais

altTitles.pl: Anioł z sąsiedztwa niezwykle mnie rozpieszcza

description.en: Mahiru is a beautiful girl whose classmates all call her an “angel.” Not only is she a star athlete with perfect grades—she’s also drop-dead gorgeous. Amane‚ an average guy and self-admitted slob‚ has never thought much of the divine beauty‚ despite attending the same school. Everything changes‚ however‚ when he happens to see Mahiru sitting alone in a park during a rainstorm. Thus begins the strange relationship between this incredibly unlikely pair!
description.ja: 高校生の藤宮周が住むマンションの隣には、「天使様」と呼ばれる学校で一番の美少女・椎名真昼が住んでいる。特に関わり合いのなかった二人だが、雨の中ずぶ濡れになっていた彼女に傘を貸したことから、不思議な交流が始まった。自堕落な一人暮らしを送る周を見かねて、なにかと世話を焼く真昼。お互いに興味ないと言い合う二人は、それでも少しずつ距離を縮めていく……。
description.pl: Mahiru jest piękną dziewczyną, którą koledzy z klasy nazywają "aniołkiem". Jest nie tylko świetnie wysportowana i ma doskonałe oceny - jest także zabójczo piękna. Amane, przeciętny facet i samozwańczy niechluj, nigdy nie myślał zbyt wiele o tej boskiej piękności, mimo że uczęszczał do tej samej szkoły. Wszystko zmienia się jednak, gdy widzi Mahiru siedzącą samotnie w parku podczas ulewy. Tak zaczyna się dziwna relacja między tą nieprawdopodobną parą!
description.vi: Fujimiya Amane sống một mình trong căn hộ của mình, và cô gái xinh nhất ở trường cậu, Shiina Mahiru, lại là hàng xóm của cậu. Họ hầu như chẳng bao giờ nói chuyện với nhau cho tới một ngày trời mưa cậu thấy cô không cầm theo ô và cho cô mượn. Để cảm ơn thì cô đã thường xuyên giúp anh làm việc nhà, từ đó mối quan hệ của họ bắt đầu nảy nở.
description.pt-br:
Fujimiya Amane, um estudante do ensino médio, mora sozinho em seu apartamento. Ao lado dele mora Shiina Mahiru, a garota mais bonita da escola. Alguém que todos chamam de "anjo". Eles nunca conversam de verdade, mas quando Amane empresta seu guarda-chuva a Mahiru em um dia chuvoso, o relacionamento deles começa a florescer.

Em pouco tempo Mahiru descobre que Amane negligencia sua cozinha e limpeza, e ela se sente obrigada a intervir.

Embora eles não tenham nenhum interesse um pelo outro, eles lentamente se aproximam...

Esta é a história de amor agridoce de um jovem e sua bela vizinha de língua afiada.

altTitles.ja: ナルト
NARUTO―ナルト― カラー版

description.en: Twelve years ago, the powerful Nine-Tailed Demon Fox attacked the ninja village of Konohagakure. The demon was quickly defeated and sealed into the infant Naruto Uzumaki, by the Fourth Hokage who sacrificed his life to protect the village. Now Naruto is the number one knucklehead ninja who's determined to become the next Hokage and gain recognition by everyone who ever doubted him!
description.pt-br: Versão totalmente colorida do famoso mangá "Naruto". Uzumaki Naruto é um garoto que teve um demônio preso dentro dele quando era um bebê, para evitar que esse demônio destruísse sua vila. Ele cresceu sendo temido por todos, já que existe a lembrança dos mortos pelo demônio em quase todas as famílias. Evitado e ignorado, tudo o que ele realmente deseja é ser amado e reconhecido pelos outros, pelo que de fato ele é. Acompanhe a vida de Naruto, seu amor pela "doce e amável" Sakura e sua "amizade" com Sasuke... Uma história aparentemente simples, em que o herói acumula poderes e vence os malvados, fazendo amigos no caminho, certo? Errado. Naruto tem ação e comédia, sim, mas o tema central do mangá é a solidão e como cada um dos personagens lida com essa solidão. A leveza cômica de alguns capítulos é francamente contrastante com o clima pesado e trágico de outros.

altTitles.ja: 働かないふたり

description.en: A slice-of-life story about two siblings, both jobless shut-ins. Haruko is a teenage girl who shares with her brother a love of laying around the house in sweats, watching television and playing video games. Her brother has a few friends, but Haruko has a lot of problems with social anxiety. The two of them pass their days happily playing together, though their mother worries about how she's going to get Haruko to shape up enough to find a husband.
description.pt: Haruko é uma adolescente que compartilha com seu irmão um amor de ficar em casa de moletom, assistindo televisão e jogando videogames. Seu irmão tem alguns amigos, mas Haruko tem um monte de problemas com ansiedade social. Os dois passam seus dias felizes brincando juntos, embora sua mãe se preocupa sobre como Haruko vai ficar e se melhorar o suficiente para encontrar um marido.
description.es-la: La historia del día a día de dos hermanos, ambos encerrados y sin trabajo. Haruko es una adolescente que comparte con su hermano el amor por holgazanear en la casa en sudaderas, mirar televisión y jugar videojuegos. Su hermano tiene algunos amigos, pero Haruko tiene muchos problemas de ansiedad social. Los dos pasan sus días felices jugando juntos, aunque a su madre le preocupa cómo hará que Haruko se ponga en forma lo suficiente como para encontrar un marido.

description.en: When the Demon King feels challenged by the hero to find love, he infiltrates the school for human adventurers where romance thrives the most, only to find that the school is under the holy church... which main purpose is to kill the Demon King.

altTitles.ja: 武錬天下

description.ar: رحلة الوصول إلى قمة فنون القتال هي رحلة وحيدة موحشة وطويلة. في مواجهة الشدائد يجب عليك البقاء على قيد الحياة والقتال بلا هوادة، وعندها فقط يمكنك الارتقاء ومتابعة رحلتك لتصبح الأقوى. تختبر طائفة الجناح السماوي الأعلى تلاميذها بأقسى الطرق لإعدادهم لهذه الرحلة، وفي أحد الأيام تمكن المتدرب الضعيف يانغ كاي من الحصول على كتاب أسود مما جعله على الطريق إلى قمة عالم فنون القتال.
description.en:
The peak of martial arts is solitary and lonely. It is an endless pursuit for unattainable heights as well. In order to surpass the limits of martial arts, growth and the will to survive in adverse situations is necessary.
One day, Yang Kai, a disciple-on-trial (and floor sweeper) of the Lingxiao Martial Arts Sect discovered a Wordless Black Book. That marked the turn in his luck and the beginning of his martial arts journey.
description.fr: Le chemin vers le sommet martial (Martial Peak) est long et solitaire. Face à l’adversité, il faut survivre et persévérer. Il est alors possible de percer et poursuivre l'ascension pour devenir le plus fort. Le Haut Pavillon Céleste entraîne ses disciples de la manière la plus sévère afin de les préparer à ce voyage. Un beau jour, le modeste balayeur Yang Kai met la main sur un livre noir, le lançant sur la route vers l'apogée du monde martial.
description.ru: Путь на вершину боевых искусств - путь одинокий и длинный. Перед лицом невзгод ты должен оставаться сильным и неотступным. Только тогда ты сможешь преодолеть все препятствия и стать по-настоящему сильным. Небесная Башня обучает своих учеников самым суровым образом, чтобы они могли выстоять в мире боевых искусств. Но только из-за одного самого незначительного проступка наш главный герой, Янг Кай, может быть исключен из Небесной Башни.
description.uk: Шлях до бойової вершини - самотній, відлюдний і довгий. Перед обличчям негараздів ти повинен вижити і залишатися непохитним. Тільки тоді ти зможеш прорватися і продовжити свій шлях, щоб стати найсильнішим. Небесна вершина випробовує своїх учнів найсуворішими способами, щоб підготувати їх до цієї подорожі. Одного разу скромному підмітальнику Ян Каю вдалося роздобути чорну книгу, яка відкриває йому шлях до вершини світу бойових мистецтв.
description.vi: Võ đạo đỉnh phong, là cô độc, là tịch mịch, là dài đằng đẵng cầu tác, là cao xử bất thắng hàn Phát triển trong nghịch cảnh, cầu sinh nơi tuyệt địa, bất khuất không buông tha, mới có thể có thể phá võ chi cực đạo. Lăng Tiêu các thí luyện đệ tử kiêm quét rác gã sai vặt Dương Khai ngẫu lấy được một bản vô tự hắc thư, từ nay về sau đạp vào dài đằng đẵng võ đạo.
description.zh: 《武炼巅峰》漫画版是由深圳漫画团队噼咔噼绘制，根据阅文集团旗起点中文网的同名小说改编，作者是莫默。武之巅峰，是孤独，是寂寞，是漫漫求索，是高处不胜寒。逆境中成长，绝地里求生，才能堪破武之极道。凌霄阁试炼弟子兼扫地小厮杨开偶获一本无字黑书，从此踏上漫漫武道。
description.es-la: El viaje hacia la cima marcial es solitario y largo. Ante la adversidad, debes sobrevivir y permanecer inflexible. Solo entonces podrás avanzar y continuar tu viaje para convertirte en el más fuerte. El "Pabellón Cielo Alto" pone a prueba a sus discípulos de las formas más duras para prepararlos para este viaje. Un día, el humilde barrendero Yang Kai logró obtener un libro negro, lo que lo puso en el camino hacia la cima del mundo marcial.
description.pt-br: A jornada para o Pico Marcial é algo longo e solitário. Indo de encontro com a adversidade, você deve sobreviver e permanecer vivo. Apenas aqueles que superarem os limites continuarão a jornada rumo ao objetivo de se tornar o mais forte. A Sky Tower testa seus discípulos de maneiras bem complexas para esta jornada. Um dia, o menosprezado Yang Kai conseguiu obter um livro negro, fazendo-o tomar rumo ao pico do mundo marcial.

description.en:
There are animals that were abandoned by Dangun and live secretly in the human world. Narae, an ordinary high school student, discovers their existence...
A modern version of Beauty and the Beast with comedy and exorcism action.

‘Will the project of becoming human, for the animals that could not become human, be successful?'

Ji-hwan Kang, who was forced to transfer schools after getting involved in a gang fight, decides to ask Yu-seong Han, the top student in the class, for help with his studies. However, he accidentally tears Yu-seong's school uniform. But what's that on Yu-seong's back? A tiger tattoo on this supposedly model student?! Ji-hwan proposes to keep Yu-seong's tattoo and identity a secret in exchange for tutoring. In response, Yu-seong deliberately begins to engage in close physical contact, hoping to make Ji-hwan give up on his own...

altTitles.ja: カーストロマンス

description.en: Jin Daim has no friends, but likes drawing. Iljina is the most popular girl in school, even though she rejects every confession. Daim thinks she and her friends are an annoyance and disturbs his drawing time before class, but all he ever draws is her. Things get complicated when his secret sketch books gets discovered by one of Iljina's friends.

altTitles.ja: みーちゃんは飼われたい

description.en: Iori is a young man in his twenties who has been stressed at work, lost his cat that he had kept for many years, and is suffering from insomnia and loss of appetite. The next morning, he finds a beautiful, naked girl lying beside him...?
description.ja: 〈ウルトラジャンプ連載作品〉仕事のストレスに加え、長年飼った飼い猫を失い不眠＆食欲不振ぎみのアラサー青年いおり。疲れ切った夜、迷い込んできた黒猫を家にあげて世話すると、翌朝、全裸の美少女が横に寝ていて…‼︎?？「あたしを飼わせてあげる」ーー強引勝手気ままな彼女の正体は…？？
description.uk:
"Ми їстимемо разом, спатимемо разом і поліпшуватимемо якість життя Іорі разом".

Іорі - молодий чоловік, який на додачу до стресу на роботі ще й колись втратив улюблену кішку, а тепер страждає від безсоння й анорексії. І ось одного ранку він виявляє, що поруч з ним спить красива оголена незнайомка...

Надзвичайна героїня-цілителька та жалюгідний чоловік, який дуже любить котів, починають жити разом!
description.pt-br: Lori é um Jovem de 20 anos que está estressado por conta do trabalho, além disso ele perdeu seu gato que tinha há muitos anos e por isso está sofrendo de insônia e perda de apetite. Na manhã seguinte, ele encontra uma linda garota nua deitada ao seu lado...?

altTitles.ja: もどきども
